docs.lead_paragraph: GREENBURGH, N.Y. - Donnie Walsh missed the resurgence and the regression, Carmelo's visit, Pierce's shot and LeBron's demolition. But he plans to be back in his familiar seat at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday night when the Knicks host the Oklahoma City Thunder.

headline.main: Walsh Out of Sight, but Not Out of the Loop

docs.abstract: Knicks General Manager Donnie Walsh has not been attending games since his recent hip surgery, but he has been active on the phones, searching for bench help, and keeping tabs on a potential trade for Carmelo Anthony.
docs.snippet: Knicks General Manager Donnie Walsh has not been attending games since his recent hip surgery, but he has been active on the phones, searching for bench help, and keeping tabs on a potential trade for Carmelo Anthony.
